reviews.productTitle: Baomain Triple Rocker Light Switch, 15A 120V, 3 Switches, Commercial Grade, White
reviews.text: I'll be returning this crummy piece of junk. Main issues: 1. Terminal screws are poor quality and do not engage straight blade screw drivers securely. 2. One terminal screw stripped while securing wire. I used a proper amount of torque to fasten the wire, but the screw stripped and now is not safe to use. 3. The plastic paddle switches do not fit well, and one leaves a visible gap when in the OFF position. 4. The feel of the switch action is different in the ON vs OFF positions. It takes more force to switch them off than to switch them on. Very dissatisfied. I'll be returning this turd, and have already ordered a replacement switch from Home Depot: Leviton brand, which is a reputable manufacturer. I should have done this to begin with.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2025
reviews.title: Poor quality, defective, unacceptable.

reviews.productTitle: Baomain Triple Rocker Light Switch, 15A 120V, 3 Switches, Commercial Grade, White
reviews.text: The button snaps on, but soft-closes off (no sharp snap). Wires insert pretty hard, and pull out even harder (difficult to disengage the clamping clip). I ended up going with side-wiring. While it is the lowest cost item with good overall ratings, I don't know how long it will last: many users online say they got 2 bad out of 2, some bought one, got a replacement from Amazon/mfg, had a second subsequent failure, and others got less than 1 year usage before replacing (previous switch in the house lasted 7+ years before cracking through, full failure). The more I think about it, the more I plan to switch to the more expensive one (fortunately, I bought two at the same time, though installed this one as it was a low profile block).
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 15, 2024
reviews.title: Works but not great quality

reviews.text: Got this switch all connected and ready to go only to find out it doesn’t work. Unfortunately this discovery was made at 10p when it was too late to go to the store and replace it so had to go without a bathroom light overnight. Do yourself a favor and don’t buy cheap crap on Amazon, just spend the extra at Lowe’s or Home Depot.

reviews.productTitle: Baomain Triple Rocker Light Switch, 15A 120V, 3 Switches, Commercial Grade, White
reviews.text: I'm using the switch for a DC power switching to some LED light strips. It works great for the purpose, but the screw terminals aren't amazing so I just attached a U-shaped terminal to my wires and it seems to work well. Looks great on the wall. Also functions as a 1:3 splitter for your input wire because it switches them off the same screw terminal.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on August 9, 2023
reviews.title: Works best if you attach terminals to your stranded wire
